author: __climber__
content: Not sure these distinctions are always totally clear. Sidechains in particular sit somewhere between L1s and L2s. They are separate chains but connected in some meaningful way like check pointing (posting data to). I would think a bridge isn't enough. L1s are their own chain and not posting data to another L1. EVM compatible means they can run Ethereum smart contracts. And L2s depend on the L1.
